dcterms:creator: M. Bijankhan
J. Sheikhzadegan
M. R. Roohani
dcterms:description: The FARSDAT dataset was collected for Persian speech and speaker recognition purposes, comprising 608 wave files of 20 seconds long sentences spoken by 304 native Persian speakers with various accents. It includes manual annotations at phoneme and word levels for all utterances.
dcterms:title: FARSDAT
